name: inst_per_warp
long_description: Average number of instructions executed by each warp

name: branch_efficiency
long_description: Ratio of branch instruction to sum of branch and divergent branch instruction

name: warp_execution_efficiency
long_description: Ratio of the average active threads per warp to the maximum number of threads per warp supported on a multiprocessor

name: warp_nonpred_execution_efficiency
long_description: Ratio of the average active threads per warp executing non-predicated instructions to the maximum number of threads per warp supported on a multiprocessor

name: inst_replay_overhead
long_description: Average number of replays for each instruction executed

name: shared_load_transactions_per_request
short_description: Shared Memory Load Transactions Per Request
long_description: Average number of shared memory load transactions performed for each shared memory load

name: shared_store_transactions_per_request
short_description: Shared Memory Store Transactions Per Request
long_description: Average number of shared memory store transactions performed for each shared memory store

name: local_load_transactions_per_request
short_description: Local Memory Load Transactions Per Request
long_description: Average number of local memory load transactions performed for each local memory load

name: local_store_transactions_per_request
short_description: Local Memory Store Transactions Per Request
long_description: Average number of local memory store transactions performed for each local memory store

name: gld_transactions_per_request
long_description: Average number of global memory load transactions performed for each global memory load.

name: gst_transactions_per_request
long_description: Average number of global memory store transactions performed for each global memory store

name: shared_store_transactions
long_description: Number of shared memory store transactions

name: shared_load_transactions
long_description: Number of shared memory load transactions

name: local_load_transactions
long_description: Number of local memory load transactions

name: local_store_transactions
long_description: Number of local memory store transactions

name: gld_transactions
long_description: Number of global memory load transactions

name: gst_transactions
long_description: Number of global memory store transactions

name: sysmem_read_transactions
long_description: Number of system memory read transactions

name: sysmem_write_transactions
long_description: Number of system memory write transactions

name: l2_read_transactions
long_description: Memory read transactions seen at L2 cache for all read requests

name: l2_write_transactions
long_description: Memory write transactions seen at L2 cache for all write requests

name: dram_read_transactions
long_description: Device memory read transactions

name: dram_write_transactions
long_description: Device memory write transactions

name: global_hit_rate
short_description: Global Hit Rate in unified l1/tex
long_description: Hit rate for global load and store in unified l1/tex cache

name: local_hit_rate
long_description: Hit rate for local loads and stores

name: gld_requested_throughput
long_description: Requested global memory load throughput

name: gst_requested_throughput
long_description: Requested global memory store throughput

name: gld_throughput
long_description: Global memory load throughput

name: gst_throughput
long_description: Global memory store throughput

name: local_memory_overhead
long_description: Ratio of local memory traffic to total memory traffic between the L1 and L2 caches expressed as percentage

name: tex_cache_hit_rate
long_description: Unified cache hit rate

name: l2_tex_read_hit_rate
long_description: Hit rate at L2 cache for all read requests from texture cache

name: l2_tex_write_hit_rate
long_description: Hit Rate at L2 cache for all write requests from texture cache

name: dram_read_throughput
long_description: Device memory read throughput

name: dram_write_throughput
long_description: Device memory write throughput

name: tex_cache_throughput
long_description: Unified cache to Multiprocessor read throughput

name: l2_tex_read_throughput
long_description: Memory read throughput seen at L2 cache for read requests from the texture cache

name: l2_tex_write_throughput
long_description: Memory write throughput seen at L2 cache for write requests from the texture cache

name: l2_read_throughput
long_description: Memory read throughput seen at L2 cache for all read requests

name: l2_write_throughput
long_description: Memory write throughput seen at L2 cache for all write requests

name: sysmem_read_throughput
long_description: System memory read throughput

name: sysmem_write_throughput
long_description: System memory write throughput

name: local_load_throughput
long_description: Local memory load throughput

name: local_store_throughput
long_description: Local memory store throughput

name: shared_load_throughput
long_description: Shared memory load throughput

name: shared_store_throughput
long_description: Shared memory store throughput

name: gld_efficiency
long_description: Ratio of requested global memory load throughput to required global memory load throughput expressed as percentage.

name: gst_efficiency
long_description: Ratio of requested global memory store throughput to required global memory store throughput expressed as percentage.

name: tex_cache_transactions
long_description: Unified cache to Multiprocessor read transactions

name: flop_count_dp
long_description: Number of double-precision floating-point operations executed by non-predicated threads (add, multiply, and multiply-accumulate). Each multiply-accumulate operation contributes 2 to the count.

name: flop_count_dp_add
long_description: Number of double-precision floating-point add operations executed by non-predicated threads.

name: flop_count_dp_fma
long_description: Number of double-precision floating-point multiply-accumulate operations executed by non-predicated threads. Each multiply-accumulate operation contributes 1 to the count.

name: flop_count_dp_mul
long_description: Number of double-precision floating-point multiply operations executed by non-predicated threads.

name: flop_count_sp
long_description: Number of single-precision floating-point operations executed by non-predicated threads (add, multiply, and multiply-accumulate). Each multiply-accumulate operation contributes 2 to the count. The count does not include special operations.

name: flop_count_sp_add
long_description: Number of single-precision floating-point add operations executed by non-predicated threads.

name: flop_count_sp_fma
long_description: Number of single-precision floating-point multiply-accumulate operations executed by non-predicated threads. Each multiply-accumulate operation contributes 1 to the count.

name: flop_count_sp_mul
long_description: Number of single-precision floating-point multiply operations executed by non-predicated threads.

name: flop_count_sp_special
long_description: Number of single-precision floating-point special operations executed by non-predicated threads.

name: inst_executed
long_description: The number of instructions executed

name: inst_issued
long_description: The number of instructions issued

name: dram_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the device memory relative to the peak utilization on a scale of 0 to 10

name: sysmem_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the system memory relative to the peak utilization on a scale of 0 to 10

name: stall_inst_fetch
long_description: Percentage of stalls occurring because the next assembly instruction has not yet been fetched

name: stall_exec_dependency
long_description: Percentage of stalls occurring because an input required by the instruction is not yet available

name: stall_memory_dependency
long_description: Percentage of stalls occurring because a memory operation cannot be performed due to the required resources not being available or fully utilized, or because too many requests of a given type are outstanding

name: stall_texture
long_description: Percentage of stalls occurring because the texture sub-system is fully utilized or has too many outstanding requests

name: stall_sync
long_description: Percentage of stalls occurring because the warp is blocked at a __syncthreads() call

name: stall_other
long_description: Percentage of stalls occurring due to miscellaneous reasons

name: stall_constant_memory_dependency
long_description: Percentage of stalls occurring because of immediate constant cache miss

name: stall_pipe_busy
long_description: Percentage of stalls occurring because a compute operation cannot be performed because the compute pipeline is busy

name: shared_efficiency
long_description: Ratio of requested shared memory throughput to required shared memory throughput expressed as percentage

name: inst_fp_32
long_description: Number of single-precision floating-point instructions executed by non-predicated threads (arithmetic, compare, etc.)

name: inst_fp_64
long_description: Number of double-precision floating-point instructions executed by non-predicated threads (arithmetic, compare, etc.)

name: inst_integer
long_description: Number of integer instructions executed by non-predicated threads

name: inst_bit_convert
long_description: Number of bit-conversion instructions executed by non-predicated threads

name: inst_control
long_description: Number of control-flow instructions executed by non-predicated threads (jump, branch, etc.)

name: inst_compute_ld_st
long_description: Number of compute load/store instructions executed by non-predicated threads

name: inst_misc
long_description: Number of miscellaneous instructions executed by non-predicated threads

name: inst_inter_thread_communication
long_description: Number of inter-thread communication instructions executed by non-predicated threads

name: issue_slots
long_description: The number of issue slots used

name: cf_issued
long_description: Number of issued control-flow instructions

name: cf_executed
long_description: Number of executed control-flow instructions

name: ldst_issued
long_description: Number of issued local, global, shared and texture memory load and store instructions

name: ldst_executed
long_description: Number of executed local, global, shared and texture memory load and store instructions

name: atomic_transactions
long_description: Global memory atomic and reduction transactions

name: atomic_transactions_per_request
long_description: Average number of global memory atomic and reduction transactions performed for each atomic and reduction instruction

name: l2_atomic_throughput
long_description: Memory read throughput seen at L2 cache for atomic and reduction requests

name: l2_atomic_transactions
long_description: Memory read transactions seen at L2 cache for atomic and reduction requests

name: l2_tex_read_transactions
long_description: Memory read transactions seen at L2 cache for read requests from the texture cache

name: stall_memory_throttle
long_description: Percentage of stalls occurring because of memory throttle

name: stall_not_selected
long_description: Percentage of stalls occurring because warp was not selected

name: l2_tex_write_transactions
long_description: Memory write transactions seen at L2 cache for write requests from the texture cache

name: nvlink_total_data_transmitted
long_description: Total data bytes transmitted through NVLink including headers

name: nvlink_total_data_received
long_description: Total data bytes received through NVLink including headers

name: nvlink_user_data_transmitted
long_description: User data bytes transmitted through NVLink, doesn't include headers

name: nvlink_user_data_received
long_description: User data bytes received through NVLink, doesn't include headers

name: nvlink_overhead_data_transmitted
long_description: Ratio of overhead data to the total data, transmitted through NVLink

name: nvlink_overhead_data_received
long_description: Ratio of overhead data to the total data, received through NVLink

name: nvlink_total_nratom_data_transmitted
long_description: Total non-reduction atomic data bytes transmitted through NVLink

name: nvlink_user_nratom_data_transmitted
long_description: Total non-reduction atomic user data bytes transmitted through NVLink

name: nvlink_total_ratom_data_transmitted
long_description: Total reduction atomic data bytes transmitted through NVLink

name: nvlink_user_ratom_data_transmitted
long_description: Total reduction atomic user data bytes transmitted through NVLink

name: nvlink_total_write_data_transmitted
long_description: Total write data bytes transmitted through NVLink

name: nvlink_user_write_data_transmitted
long_description: User write data bytes transmitted through NVLink

name: nvlink_transmit_throughput
long_description: Number of bytes transmitted per second through NVLink

name: nvlink_receive_throughput
long_description: Number of bytes received per second through NVLink

name: nvlink_total_response_data_received
long_description: Total response data bytes received through NVLink, response data includes data for read requests and result of non-reduction atomic requests

name: nvlink_user_response_data_received
long_description: Total user response data bytes received through NVLink, response data includes data for read requests and result of non-reduction atomic requests

name: flop_count_hp
long_description: Number of half-precision floating-point operations executed by non-predicated threads (add, multiply, and multiply-accumulate). Each multiply-accumulate contributes 2 or 4 to the count based on the number of inputs.

name: flop_count_hp_add
long_description: Number of half-precision floating-point add operations executed by non-predicated threads.

name: flop_count_hp_mul
long_description: Number of half-precision floating-point multiply operations executed by non-predicated threads.

name: flop_count_hp_fma
long_description: Number of half-precision floating-point multiply-accumulate operations executed by non-predicated threads. Each multiply-accumulate contributes 2 or 4 to the count based on the number of inputs.

name: inst_fp_16
long_description: Number of half-precision floating-point instructions executed by non-predicated threads (arithmetic, compare, etc.)

name: ipc
long_description: Instructions executed per cycle

name: issued_ipc
long_description: Instructions issued per cycle

name: issue_slot_utilization
long_description: Percentage of issue slots that issued at least one instruction, averaged across all cycles

name: sm_efficiency
long_description: The percentage of time at least one warp is active on a specific multiprocessor

name: achieved_occupancy
long_description: Ratio of the average active warps per active cycle to the maximum number of warps supported on a multiprocessor

name: eligible_warps_per_cycle
long_description: Average number of warps that are eligible to issue per active cycle

name: shared_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the shared memory relative to peak utilization on a scale of 0 to 10

name: l2_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the L2 cache relative to the peak utilization on a scale of 0 to 10

name: tex_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the unified cache relative to the peak utilization on a scale of 0 to 10

name: ldst_fu_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the multiprocessor function units that execute shared load, shared store and constant load instructions on a scale of 0 to 10

name: cf_fu_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the multiprocessor function units that execute control-flow instructions on a scale of 0 to 10

name: tex_fu_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the multiprocessor function units that execute global, local and texture memory instructions on a scale of 0 to 10

name: special_fu_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the multiprocessor function units that execute sin, cos, ex2, popc, flo, and similar instructions on a scale of 0 to 10

name: half_precision_fu_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the multiprocessor function units that execute 16 bit floating-point instructions on a scale of 0 to 10. Note that this doesn't specify the utilization level of tensor core unit

name: single_precision_fu_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the multiprocessor function units that execute single-precision floating-point instructions on a scale of 0 to 10

name: double_precision_fu_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the multiprocessor function units that execute double-precision floating-point instructions on a scale of 0 to 10

name: flop_hp_efficiency
long_description: Ratio of achieved to peak half-precision floating-point operations

name: flop_sp_efficiency
long_description: Ratio of achieved to peak single-precision floating-point operations

name: flop_dp_efficiency
long_description: Ratio of achieved to peak double-precision floating-point operations

name: sysmem_read_utilization
long_description: The read utilization level of the system memory relative to the peak utilization on a scale of 0 to 10

name: sysmem_write_utilization
long_description: The write utilization level of the system memory relative to the peak utilization on a scale of 0 to 10

name: nvlink_data_transmission_efficiency
long_description: Data transmission efficiency of NVLink

name: nvlink_data_receive_efficiency
long_description: Data receive efficiency of NVLink

name: stall_sleeping
long_description: Percentage of stalls occurring because warp was sleeping

name: pcie_total_data_transmitted
long_description: Total data bytes transmitted through PCIe

name: pcie_total_data_received
long_description: Total data bytes received through PCIe

name: inst_executed_global_loads
short_description: Warp level instructions for global loads
long_description: Warp level instructions for global loads

name: inst_executed_local_loads
short_description: Warp level instructions for local loads
long_description: Warp level instructions for local loads

name: inst_executed_shared_loads
short_description: Warp level instructions for shared loads
long_description: Warp level instructions for shared loads

name: inst_executed_surface_loads
short_description: Warp level instructions for surface loads
long_description: Warp level instructions for surface loads

name: inst_executed_global_stores
short_description: Warp level instructions for global stores
long_description: Warp level instructions for global stores

name: inst_executed_local_stores
short_description: Warp level instructions for local stores
long_description: Warp level instructions for local stores

name: inst_executed_shared_stores
short_description: Warp level instructions for shared stores
long_description: Warp level instructions for shared stores

name: inst_executed_surface_stores
short_description: Warp level instructions for surface stores
long_description: Warp level instructions for surface stores

name: inst_executed_global_atomics
short_description: Warp level instructions for global atom and atom cas
long_description: Warp level instructions for global atom and atom cas

name: inst_executed_global_reductions
short_description: Warp level instructions for global reductions
long_description: Warp level instructions for global reductions

name: inst_executed_surface_atomics
short_description: Warp level instructions for surface atom and atom cas
long_description: Warp level instructions for surface atom and atom cas

name: inst_executed_surface_reductions
short_description: Warp level instructions for surface reductions
long_description: Warp level instructions for surface reductions

name: inst_executed_shared_atomics
short_description: Warp level shared instructions for atom and atom CAS
long_description: Warp level shared instructions for atom and atom CAS

name: inst_executed_tex_ops
long_description: Warp level instructions for texture

name: dram_read_bytes
short_description: Total bytes read from DRAM to L2 cache
long_description: Total bytes read from DRAM to L2 cache

name: dram_write_bytes
short_description: Total bytes written from L2 cache to DRAM
long_description: Total bytes written from L2 cache to DRAM

name: global_load_requests
short_description: Total number of global load requests from Multiprocessor
long_description: Total number of global load requests from Multiprocessor

name: local_load_requests
short_description: Total number of local load requests from Multiprocessor
long_description: Total number of local load requests from Multiprocessor

name: surface_load_requests
short_description: Total number of surface load requests from Multiprocessor
long_description: Total number of surface load requests from Multiprocessor

name: global_store_requests
short_description: Total number of global store requests from Multiprocessor
long_description: Total number of global store requests from Multiprocessor. This does not include atomic requests.

name: local_store_requests
short_description: Total number of local store requests from Multiprocessor
long_description: Total number of local store requests from Multiprocessor

name: surface_store_requests
short_description: Total number of surface store requests from Multiprocessor
long_description: Total number of surface store requests from Multiprocessor

name: global_atomic_requests
short_description: Total number of global atomic requests from Multiprocessor
long_description: Total number of global atomic(Atom and Atom CAS) requests from Multiprocessor

name: global_reduction_requests
short_description: Total number of global reduction requests from Multiprocessor
long_description: Total number of global reduction requests from Multiprocessor

name: surface_atomic_requests
short_description: Total number of surface atomic requests from Multiprocessor
long_description: Total number of surface atomic(Atom and Atom CAS) requests from Multiprocessor

name: surface_reduction_requests
short_description: Total number of surface reduction requests from Multiprocessor
long_description: Total number of surface reduction requests from Multiprocessor

name: l2_global_load_bytes
short_description: Bytes read from L2 for misses in L1 for global loads
long_description: Bytes read from L2 for misses in L1 for global loads

name: l2_local_load_bytes
short_description: Bytes read from L2 for misses in L1 for local loads
long_description: Bytes read from L2 for misses in L1 for local loads

name: l2_surface_load_bytes
short_description: Bytes read from L2 for misses in L1 for surface loads
long_description: Bytes read from L2 for misses in L1 for surface loads

name: l2_global_atomic_store_bytes
short_description: Bytes written to L2 from L1 for global atomics
long_description: Bytes written to L2 from L1 for global atomics (ATOM and ATOM CAS)

name: l2_local_global_store_bytes
short_description: Bytes written to L2 from L1 for local and global stores.
long_description: Bytes written to L2 from L1 for local and global stores. This does not include global atomics.

name: l2_surface_store_bytes
short_description: Bytes read from L2 for misses in L1 for surface stores
long_description: Bytes read from L2 for misses in L1 for surface stores

name: sysmem_read_bytes
long_description: Number of bytes read from system memory

name: sysmem_write_bytes
long_description: Number of bytes written to system memory

name: l2_tex_hit_rate
long_description: Hit rate at L2 cache for all requests from texture cache

name: texture_load_requests
short_description: Total number of texture Load requests from Multiprocessor
long_description: Total number of texture Load requests from Multiprocessor

name: tensor_precision_fu_utilization
long_description: The utilization level of the multiprocessor function units that execute tensor core instructions on a scale of 0 to 10
